title: Statement by the Press Secretary on S. 2393 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
March 31, 2016

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on S. 2393





	On Thursday, March 31, 2016, the President signed into law:

	S. 2393, the “Foreclosure Relief and Extension for Servicemembers Act of 2015,” which extends Servicemembers Civil Relief Act authorities providing mortgage foreclosure and eviction protections for servicemembers.
